posts.post_title: FS: Lot of 33 T206 - Many Mid-Grade, HOF, SL, Tougher Backs *PRICE DROP 11/6*
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T206 cards for sale.  Nice assortment with several mid-to-higher grade cards, tougher backs, HOFers, and Southern Leaguers.

Please add $4 shipping (USPS Ground Advantage which includes $100 insurance) for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Prices listed are net to me, via any payment method you prefer.

Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

CARDS PICTURED (moving remaining cards to a new listing):
Bump for a price drop on all remaining cards.  Thanks for looking!
